mapper.select: select * from contactbase where name like #{name}
select * from contactbase where groupname=#{groupname} limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(*) from contactbase where groupname=#{groupname}
select groupname from contactbase group by groupname
select * from contactbase order by groupname asc
mapper.insert: insert into contactbase (id, groupname,name, title, highid,description) values (#{id}, #{groupname},#{name},#{title}, #{highid}, #{description})
mapper.update: update contactbase set groupname=#{groupname}, name=#{name}, title=#{title}, highid=#{highid}, description=#{description} where id=#{id}
